channel.title: Notes on Ali Osman Berk Şapcı
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Ali Osman Berk Şapcı

item.title: Percolation Theory in Network Science
item.description: Consider a lattice, where we place pebbles with probability $p$ at each intersection. Neighboring pebbles are considered to be connected, forming clusters of size two or more. We are mainly interested in sizes of these clusters.

item.title: Categorical Cross Entropy
item.description: Deriving categorical cross entropy is quite trivial, and could help understanding the loss function better.
